author: maxb
msg: Import more features of the svnbook DocBook buildsystem into the svn misc-docs
- Include revision of source in output.
- 'svn-' prefix on main generated file names.

author: maxb
msg: Merge relevant changes to the DocBook build system from the svnbook repository.
* doc/HOWTO.DocBook: Minimize unnecessary differences between this file and
svnbook/src/en/README, including updating the section on XML validation
Update, rewriting top-of-file comment as appropriate.

author: pmarek
msg: (change_file_prop, change_dir_prop): Bug fixed for repos-repos diff
(eg. "svn diff -r xxx:HEAD path/to/file") - tried to stat
"svn:text-time" instead of correct file, if that property is set.
